0.00.text:
Hey guys this is Kim Dao here
and welcome back to my channel

2.66.text: So I am back with another vlog in Tokyo

5.66.text: So I am about to head out now to a salon in Ginza

11.12.text: I'm gonna do my hair so

13.26.text: I mean, I've had this hair for a while and I want to change up a little bit, I'm not too sure what I'm gonna do

18.50.text:
I've got some photos saved
so I'm gonna show the hairdresser

20.68.text: So I did my hair pink when I was in Australia, it's faded quite a lot because I have to touch it up like once a week

27.06.text: But I haven't been doing that just coz I want to make it easier for the hairdresser just in case they need to do something to my hair again

33.00.text: So I'm going to head out to do that

34.62.text: and just before I was just watching some YouTube videos so I'm sure you guys know

41.12.text:
and I love their camera reviews,
been watching them for years

44.84.text: So I'm trying to find a new camera

48.14.text: but I'm not sure which one to get yet.

49.54.text: I'm hesitating between a few different ones so

51.98.text: yeah I've been watching reviews and

54.18.text: trying to find videos that will help me decide

58.82.text: Still haven't decided what camera I want yet but

60.80.text: I really want to decide in the next few days.

62.50.text:
I've made it to Ginza and I'm gonna eat
at this really nice Udon Restaurant!

69.72.text: That looks so good, I love Udon!

73.10.text: So this place is apparently really famous for Udon Noodles and I'm getting this set.

77.90.text: So cold Udon with two sauces

83.56.text: This is the Udon and I also got Onsen Tamago.

87.00.text: And soy sauce and then sesame, it looks so good!

91.28.text: And this is cold dipping noodles!

94.50.text: So i'm going to go and do my hair now

97.06.text: I'm going to B by C Salon in Ginza!

103.02.text: They even have a cafe in here!

104.88.text: So I'm at the Salon now and I'm gonna do some layers on my hair and I'm gonna

109.68.text:
try and get some more pink into it,
so it should be really cool.

113.18.text:
And they are super friendly here
and the place is really nice!

117.98.text: Got a nice view as well when you're doing your hair.

120.18.text: There's like a really cool nice building right next to me

124.70.text: And what's unique in this salon is the person who cuts your hair is different to the person who colors your hair

129.52.text: This is the person that's gonna cut my hair!

131.78.text: This is my hair before and they're gonna fix it for me

134.62.text: give me a treatment and color my hair.

136.72.text: So the salon I'm at is called B By C

140.18.text:
And it stands for Beauty By Core so they just explained to me that it means you 
can be beautiful from your heart as well

148.68.text: They're gonna give me a smoothie as well so it kinda makes you healthy from the inside.

173.76.text: Yeah definitely get this if you guys come here.

178.50.text: I'm really happy with that it looks a lot better!

180.72.text: They didn't cut my hair too short, they didn't cut it a little bit, but I had a lot of dead ends on my hair so

186.68.text: I'm very happy that they cut that off so

188.98.text: My hair is still very dead so they're still gonna do treatment on my hair so I can't wait for that

194.86.text: Hopefully my hair is gonna look a lot better after!

215.10.text: Stil in the process of highlighting my hair

217.34.text: so I look a bit crazy right now

219.32.text:
But I love how slowly they were doing it,
they were doing it so carefully

222.56.text:
so yeah, really happy with that,
I can't wait to see how it turns out!

235.24.text: I've been sitting here for a while and they use this to fix up your hair

239.80.text: They gave me a pillow so I'm very comfortable here.

242.20.text: So they just did a treatment to my hair

244.74.text:
and this is like the difference,
so see here it's like all damaged

247.86.text: but then this one looks really nice!

249.22.text: So that's what they did to my hair.

251.10.text: Coz my hair was very damaged before.

253.68.text: So this is how it works, it just goes and protects your core on your hair

258.88.text:
And there were different treatments
that they put in my hair

270.96.text: So they just put in the manic panic into my hair again

274.74.text: And yeah it looks really really hot pink now

278.54.text: So what they do is that they mix 2 different manic panics into my hair, two different pinks so I'm really excited to see how it turns out!

284.06.text: And before I just had the ombre but now I'm gonna have like pink up in my hair so that's gonna be really cool

290.46.text: So this salon was located in Ginza so I'll link everything in the description box below.

294.92.text: So you guys can check it out.

296.20.text: But it is a very nice salon and it wasn't really that expensive either.

307.32.text: It's very pink and then you can see under here

311.44.text: It's pink under here as well so I'm really happy with that

315.12.text: So she is the face lesson teacher

317.18.text: They have different things here so they've got the hair salon, they've got the cafe

320.14.text: So she has face work lessons to kinda like improve how your face looks.

324.64.text:
So for example like "sa, shi, su, se, so"
is like a lesson that they use

329.20.text: So it's interesting and she's also from Vietnam.

331.84.text:
So I tried to speak Vietnamese
but I'm not very good at it!

358.48.text:
He's also a make-up artist and
he's gonna help me with my make up!

435.30.text:
He said to draw over the lips a little bit
to make it look a bit more cute.

461.94.text: So I did my hair, I'm really happy with it because it's like a lot more healthier now

466.46.text: and I'm just at a cafe

468.32.text: So I'm just having coffee and talking and doing some business and stuff

472.42.text: Yeah I got a coffee so i'm gonna do that now!
